pages.title: 关于
pages.text: 本人自己也不知道要做什么，在这里或许会有一个机会来创建从此新世界，的确会是这样。 是一个普通的人。

posts.title: hello myblog by hexo
posts.text: 主题首先作为一个计算机专业的学生，写一个博客是很正常的事情。

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites123public static void main(){ System.out.printl("hello world");} More info: Deployment
